newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Rotol to build S$18.8 mln factory.
newsitem.headline: Rotol to build S$18.8 mln factory.

text.p: Rotol Singapore Ltd said on Tuesday it planned to build a Singapore $18.8 million factory in Tuas, located in western Singapore.
Rotol said in a statement it would lease a 16,052 square metre plot of land from Jurong Town Corporation at an annual rent of S$296,962 to build the factory.

Rotol, a building materials and chemical company, said it would use S$2 million from its initial public offer proceeds to build the new factory. It had earlier planned to use the money to upgrade an existing factory.
